title: Recipes View Implementation
description:
Implement the recipes view for recipe orchestration.

Requirements:
- Create frontend/src/voice_code/views/recipes.cljs
- List available recipes from subscription
- Show active recipe status
- Start/stop recipe execution UI
- Recipe progress display
- Add screen to navigation in views/core.cljs

Reference:
- Design doc lists recipes.cljs in project structure  
- Backend already handles available_recipes, recipe_started, recipe_exited messages
- Event handlers already exist in websocket.cljs

title: Resources View Implementation
description:
Implement the resources view for uploaded files management.

Requirements:
- Create frontend/src/voice_code/views/resources.cljs
- List uploaded resources from subscription
- Show pending uploads indicator
- Delete resources functionality
- Navigate to resources from session view
- Add screen to navigation in views/core.cljs

Reference:
- Design doc lists resources.cljs in project structure
- Backend already handles resources_list, file_uploaded, resource_deleted messages
- Event handlers already exist in websocket.cljs

title: Phase 5: Voice Integration
description:
Implement voice input/output for the React Native app.

Requirements:
- Create voice-code.voice namespace
- Speech recognition using @react-native-voice/voice
- Text-to-speech using react-native-tts
- re-frame events and effect handlers for voice
- Setup voice recognition listeners
- TTS configuration (language, rate, etc.)

Files to Create:
- frontend/src/voice_code/voice.cljs
- frontend/test/voice_code/voice_test.cljs

Reference: docs/design/clojurescript-react-native-pilot.md Phase 5

Depends on native projects being initialized first.

title: Phase 6: Initialize Native iOS/Android Projects
description:
Initialize native iOS and Android projects for React Native.

Requirements:
- Create native projects using react-native init
- Configure iOS project in frontend/ios/
- Configure Android project in frontend/android/
- Install and link native dependencies
- Install CocoaPods for iOS
- Configure shadow-cljs hot reload with Metro bundler

Testing:
- App builds and runs on iOS simulator
- App builds and runs on Android emulator
- shadow-cljs REPL connects to running app

Reference: docs/design/clojurescript-react-native-pilot.md Phase 6
